long_description: Control Towers create a multi-sport roof rack attachment system for almost any vehicle when combined with Landing Pads (sold separately). These snap-fit towers, with their easy-to-use locking cape, lock down snugly to any of seven custom-designed Landing Pads. Together, Control Towers and Landing Pads can be installed on most any factory tracks, or directly to pick-up truck caps. Attachment to Landing Pads is quick and easy; snap-fit design provides solid, secure fit to vehicle. Multi-sport system carries a full load of gear and accessories (see Fit Guide for other parts and accessories). This system's track application makes the crossbar spread easy to adjust without removing the towers and bars. Low-profile, aerodynamic design. Yakima SKS-lock compatible. Control Tower system is comprised of 3 components: a set of Control Towers, two pairs of Landing Pads and a pair of Round Bars (all sold separately).
short_description: Control Towers create a multi-sport roof rack attachment system for almost any vehicle when combined with Landing Pads (sold separately).
